db:abstract.db:para: The QPlaceContactDetail class represents a contact detail such as a phone number or website url.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The detail consists of a label and value. The label is a localized string that can be presented to the end user that describes that detail value which is the actual phone number, email address and so on.

db:section.db:title: Contact Types
db:section.db:para: The QPlaceContactDetail class defines some constant strings which characterize standard contact types.
These types are used to access and modify contact details in QPlace via:
The contact type is intended to be a string type so that providers are able to introduce new contact types if necessary.

db:section.db:title: QPlaceContactDetail::QPlaceContactDetail()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a contact detail.

db:section.db:title: QPlaceContactDetail::QPlaceContactDetail(const QPlaceContactDetail &other)
db:section.db:para: Creates a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QPlaceContactDetail::~QPlaceContactDetail()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the contact detail.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceContactDetail::clear()
db:section.db:para: Clears the contact detail.

db:section.db:title: QString QPlaceContactDetail::label() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a label describing the contact detail.

The label can potentially be localized. The language is dependent on the entity that sets it, typically this is the manager from which the places are sourced. The QPlaceManager::locales() field defines what language is used.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceContactDetail::setLabel(const QString &label)
db:section.db:para: Sets the label of the contact detail.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceContactDetail::setValue(const QString &value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the value of this contact detail.

db:section.db:title: QString QPlaceContactDetail::value() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the contact detail.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceContactDetail::operator!=(const QPlaceContactDetail &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if other is not equal to this contact detail, otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QPlaceContactDetail &QPlaceContactDetail::operator=(const QPlaceContactDetail &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this contact detail and returns a reference to this contact detail.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceContactDetail::operator==(const QPlaceContactDetail &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if other is equal to this contact detail, otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: const QString QPlaceContactDetail::Email
db:section.db:para: The constant to specify email contact details.

db:section.db:title: const QString QPlaceContactDetail::Fax
db:section.db:para: The constant used to specify fax contact details.

db:section.db:title: const QString QPlaceContactDetail::Phone
db:section.db:para: The constant to specify phone contact details

db:section.db:title: const QString QPlaceContactDetail::Website
db:section.db:para: The constant used to specify website contact details.
